titleCN: 任天堂实验室手工纸模赛车套装
description: 2008年美国电子游戏分析师曾经指出：“就算纸箱子印上Nintendo，任天堂的粉丝也都会购买”，如今这个预言实现了，这款任天堂实验室手工纸模赛车套装让你用纸箱子做出和Switch互动的赛车
content: Put yourself right in the driver’s seat of your favorite racing games with help from the Nintendo Labo vehicle kit. Using this fun DIY kit you’ll be able to make cardboard creations that can actually be used with your Nintendo Switch.

description: 不管你喜欢《勇闯夺命岛》中的凯奇还是《绝命毒师》里的老白，作为一名化学爱好者，这款将周期表中化学元素放置在树脂盒中的系列产品，能让你近距离欣赏大自然中原装的金银钛钪钴钠锌
content: Get an up close and personal view of the elements on the periodic table with these natural earth elements acrylic cubes. Earth’s most recognized elements like gold, silver, and titanium are all encased in crystal clear 50mm Lucite acrylic for your viewing pleasure.

description: 越来越多007风格的军情六处产品从电影大荧幕走进了我们的生活，这款看似普通的黑色手提箱表面覆盖着高效防水的100瓦单晶硅太阳能电池，能让你在有太阳的地方永远保持电子设备能量充足
content: No wall outlet in sight? No problem! With Goal Zero’s solar powered briefcase you’ll be able to keep your devices juiced up no matter where you are. It boasts 100 watts of highly-efficient waterproof monocrystalline solar cells, and it folds in half for easy transport.

description: 想让你的拖车变得与众不同？这款8英尺长用12号规格钢打造的霸王龙头骨拖车挂钩适用于所有拖车标准且有多款颜色可选进行粉末涂料喷漆，给你的座驾瞬间增添《侏罗纪公园》主题的史前风格
content: Give your ride a cool pre-historic touch by attaching this T-Rex cover to your trailer hitch. This 8 inch long dino head is crafted from fabricated 12 gauge steel and is powder coated for maximum durability – making this a great gift for any dinosaur enthusiast.

description: 致所有健康饮食爱好者：科学家和营养师们研究发现，这款生长周期极短的红皮藻在提供比羽衣甘蓝多两倍的营养同时，还能在煎炸之后变出和熏猪肉一样的味道和口感，让你的健康食谱不再乏味
content: Good news everyone – scientists have discovered a seaweed that tastes like bacon while offering twice the nutritional value of kale! This miracle seaweed is a fast-growing strain of red marine algae known as dulse, that tastes just like bacon when fried.

description: 不知道产品设计师是不是从安徒生的《打火匣》经典童话中汲取的灵感，但在三星手机电池或自燃或爆炸的新闻之后还试图在锂电池上添加喷火装置，绝对彰显了设计师的气魄和使用者的硬汉本色
content: Avoid having to bum a light off a stranger by carrying around this smartphone lighter case. The unique and practical design incorporates a sleek lighter along the back so that you can easily flip it open with your finger and light up.

description: 这款憨态可掬内置高保真扬声器的橙色绒毛跳舞猫，可通过自带的音频线与任何音响设备连接，并在播放你最喜欢曲目的同时献上令人捧腹的舞步，绝对是家庭聚会公司派对不可或缺的暖场之宝
content: Get the party started with this dancing bear speaker! As soon as you flip the small switch on his left paw, this cute little party animal comes alive and begins busting a move to your favorite tunes – making it a must have for any house party.

titleEN: Samsung Wall Blending QLED Flat TV
description: 完美的电视呈上视觉的盛宴，三星这款75寸QLED平板电视将对色彩与图像的处理上升到了全新的境界，在给你带来无与伦比观看体验的同时，独特的周边环境自融入设计能让其完美契合你的家居风格
content: Treat your eyes to a visual masterpiece of brilliant color and crisp imagery every time you watch TV by upgrading to the Samsung wall blending QLED TV. It features an innovative ambient mode designed to blend in seamlessly to your home’s decor.

description: 这款容量80盎司内置制冷冰室和装饰灯光的桌面啤酒分酒器，帮你轻松将客厅打造成炫酷格调的体育酒吧，让你和朋友们在观赏精彩体育赛事的同时，开怀畅饮冰爽可口泡沫丰腴的美味佳酿
content: The BrewTender tabletop beer dispenser will ensure you’ll always have a steady supply of nice cold beer all night long. Perfect for any home bar, this awesome accessory keeps up to 80 ounces of your favorite brew ice cold until the very last drop.

titleCN: 便携式周边声音中和器
description: 这款可以通过手机APP进行设置的便携式周边声音中和器在有效消除临近噪音的同时，可播放轻松助眠的乐曲或营造夏夜森林湖边露营时的自然白噪音，让你每个夜晚都能睡得酣畅香甜
content: Escape from the stress of everyday life using this noise blocking personal zone creator. It easily sticks onto any desk or window and utilizes anti-vibration technology to block off nearby vibrating objects to create a bubble of serenity.

description: 无处安放工作室里四处散落的图钉？这款可爱的小绵羊图钉容器设计新颖，75颗不锈钢和塑料制成的图钉巧妙地伪装成了卷曲的羊毛，给你提供简洁方便的同时也增添了些许趣味和创意
content: Add a dash of adorable to your boring workstation by storing your pins inside this cute little sheep push pin holder. This small little sheep comes with 75 white head push pins that will masquerade as the sheep’s wool when they’re not in use.

description: 这款设计独特的存钱罐把收集闲置硬币的过程巧妙地变成了一款有趣的游戏：只要你将硬币放置在指定的位置，一只憨态可掬的小猫就会偷偷地从盒子里伸出爪子，喵喵叫着将其揽入怀中
content: Make saving more appealing than ever by storing your loose change inside this coin stealing piggy bank. Each time you place a coin over the designated space, an adorable little white kitty pops out of the box and grabs your coin using his small paw.

titleCN: 用贴纸创造的世界名画
description: 这款别出心裁的产品让你通过贴纸来复刻包括达芬奇的《蒙娜丽莎》、波提切利的《维纳斯的诞生》、扬维米尔的《戴珍珠耳环的少女》等12副享誉世界的油画名作，是进行艺术启蒙绝佳的途径
content: Recreate some of the world’s most iconic masterpieces with your own two hands with this awesome Paint By Sticker book. It comes with everything you’ll need to create twelve full color paintings like the Mona Lisa, The Birth of Venus, and Girl with a Pearl Earring.

titleCN: That's What She said 咖啡杯
titleEN: That's What She said Coffee Mug
description: 对于所有喜欢美版《办公室》的剧迷们来说，没有任何一句其他台词能更有效地唤醒对于史蒂夫·卡瑞尔精湛演技的记忆，这款镌刻着麦克.斯考特经典反讽口头禅的咖啡杯，是绝妙的破冰开场白
content: Raise morale at the workplace by celebrating mediocrity with this humorous “world’s okayest employee” coffee mug. This hilarious 11 ounce novelty ceramic mug comes with the funny quip printed on both sides, making this a great gift for any underachieving employee.

Sleep without fear of insects crawling into your orifices at night by camping in the Nube hammock shelter. The innovative design allows you to utilize surrounding trees to create a suspended space to keep you safe and dry while outdoors.

titleEN: 24K Gold Plated Rim Agate Drink Coasters
description: 这款由巴西天然玛瑙石切割后纯手工打造的24K镀金边玛瑙石杯垫每一块都有着独一无二的天然纹路，除了能完美地契合你的佳酿之外，也给你的厨房添加了些许的异域情趣与低调奢华
content: Add brilliant natural color to your home bar by setting your refreshing beverages down on these sliced agate drink coasters. Each coaster in the set is crafted from gorgeous sliced Brazilian agate that is complemented by an elegant 24 karat gold plated rim.

description: 生活中每一个细节都蕴藏着巨大的商机，这款将无用工程学发挥到淋漓尽致的终极版运动毛巾提供了磁石挂钩、通用拉链、隐秘口袋、触摸式啮合、防掉落保护等让人瞠目结舌的全新功能
content: This revolutionary fitness accessory is the pinnacle of gym towel engineering. It features a magnetic clip, universal zipper, 4″ x 15″ pocket, a touch sensitive mesh, anti-fall sleeve, and even a gym-side / skin-side so you can only let your skin touch one side of the towel.

description: 当炽热的骄阳让你感到脱水和窒息时，这款自带18伏锂电池的便携式雾化风扇能通过水管连接或被放置在冰桶上，被雾化后喷射出的清凉水滴能让你在烈日炎炎的夏日里时刻保持冰爽
content: Stay cool while Mother Nature tries to suffocate you with her warm embrace by using this bucket top misting fan. It comes with an 18-volt lithium-ion battery, and it can be operated with either a garden hose or with a bucket filled with water.

titleCN: 乐高007系列阿斯顿马丁模型车
description: 乐高这款内含1295片模块的007系列阿斯顿马丁模型车，让每一位忠实的影迷都能在家里以令人叹为观止的细节复刻邦德最为经典的奢华座驾，包括电影中出现的副驾驶弹出器和防弹后视镜
content: Get your hands on 007’s iconic ride without going broke by putting together this LEGO James Bond Aston Martin. This 1295 piece set depicts Bond’s classic Aston Martin DB5 with extraordinary detail – like a passenger ejector seat and a rear view bulletproof window.

titleCN: 可食用巧克力棉花糖华夫饼酒杯
description: 华夫饼制成的酒杯里内嵌着全麦饼干碎屑、比利时巧克力、以及棉花糖奶油，这款每个100卡路里的可食用巧克力棉花糖华夫饼酒杯，能给你的味蕾带来前所未有的美味享受和甜品体验
content: Send your taste buds out-of-this-world by indulging in this edible s’mores waffle shot cup. Each small 100-calorie cup is made from a Belgian chocolate coated waffle cone complemented by a crumbled graham cracker and marshmallow cream filling.

description: 朋友聚会时在迷你高尔夫和桌球的选择中左右为难？这款别出心裁的迷你版高尔夫台球完美融合了两款游戏的乐趣，让你既有机会炫耀伍兹般的挥杆技巧，也有机会展示奥沙利文般的一杆清台
content: When the family’s torn over how to spend quality time, the miniature golf billiards are sure to meet all of your family’s requirements for fun. It combines the lightheartedness of mini golfing with the competitiveness of pool for a challenging game that is ideal for all ages.

description: 拥有了属于自己的房子之后难免需要爬高上低去清理积水槽或更换空调滤芯，这款由14级规格粉末涂层钢打造并配有耐用尼龙扣带的爬梯固定器适用于所有地表环境，能有效地确保你的人身安全
content: Avoid serious injury while doing handywork around the house by placing the ladder stabilizer underneath your ladder. This versatile all-terrain tool is crafted from 14 gauge powder coated steel and fitted with durable nylon straps to secure the ladder in place.

titleEN: Make Your Own Hot Sauce Kit
description: 没有任何一件礼物能比吃后让人喉咙喷火的高品质辣椒酱更使人血脉偾张了，这款套装除了包含自制辣椒酱需要的工具外，还自带了安丘辣椒、奇波雷烟熏辣椒、哈巴内罗灯笼辣椒等顶级辣椒粉
content: Make your favorite hot head jump with joy when they open your gift and find this cool make your own hot sauce kit. This nifty little kit comes with everything needed to whip up 7 bottles of some deliciously spicy gourmet hot sauce.

titleCN: 一氧化二氮红酒开瓶器
description: 这款包装精美设计新颖号称世界上最简单最快速的红酒开瓶器可以彻底地颠覆你过往的一切经验：只需轻轻按动按钮，一氧化二氮增压器会产生8g压力轻松将红酒瓶的软木塞完好无损吸出并开启
content: Effortlessly uncork your bottle with the push of a button by grabbing a hold of this Nitrous oxide powered wine opener. It comes with an 8g N2O charger that will instantly pop open your bottle with no mess so that you can keep the wine flowing all night long.

description: 这款用可回收钢材打造的脏话炸弹镇纸，除了帮你保持办公桌上各种文件摘要和会议记录井然有序之外，还能用略显无厘头的幽默元素和反讽方式在严肃的职场环境里让人会心一笑
content: Now you can drop f-bombs all day long and be commended for your organization and professionalism around the workplace with the f-bomb paperweight. Made from recycled steel, it’s great for keeping memos neat and tidy on your desk.

description: 这款用结实的浇注聚树脂打造并手工涂漆的9.5英尺高陶瓷防水地精塑像，让你把花园和草坪变得更有生趣的同时，以独特的方式向艾尔·帕西诺在疤面人电影中的经典造型完美致敬
content: Say hello to our little friend – and his little friend – with the Scarface lawn gnome. This aggressive little fellow stands vigilant and ready to go postal on the first neighbor or neighborhood pet who accidentally stumbles onto your perfectly manicured lawn.

description: 这款设计别致在市场上绝无仅有的iPhone电击枪防水手机壳，不但可以有效地保护手机并为其充电，还能在危险的时刻化身为可产生7百万伏的电压的电击枪，让你击退任何可能的袭击者
content: The iPhone stun gun case is the only case on the market that doubles as a personal bodyguard. Apart from protecting your treasured iPhone, the case comes with a built in stun gun capable of delivering up to 7,000,000 volts of knockout power to an assailant.

description: 这款用西部红雪松打造的全自动蜜糖收集蜂巢制作精细唯美设计新颖大胆，其专利技术极大简化了繁复的取蜜过程，使采集蜂蜜变得像开水龙头一样简单，让养蜂变成了一个能在后院实现的梦想
content: Enjoy a steady supply of all natural honey without risking getting stung by using the automatic honey collecting beehive. The intrepid design of this quaint little cottage allows you to simply turn the tap and watch the honey flow directly into your jar.

description: “对于任何一个够资格拿起这个锤子的人，都将拥有雷神索尔的力量”，这款镌刻着奥丁语录的迷你复刻版雷神之锤，让你能握紧舒适的橡胶锤柄，用雷神般的震怒捶向等待下锅的牛排鸡胸和里脊肉
content: Pound your meats with god-like fury by wielding this mini Mjolnir. Shaped like the Thunder God’s iconic weapon, it features a comfy silicone grip and sports an engraving that reads “whosoever holds this hammer, if they be worthy, shall possess the power of Thor!”.

description: 这款原产新西兰纯手工打造外观颇似李小龙经典武道服的16盎司香茅灭蚊蜡烛，点燃后可持续燃烧8小时，能在沁人心脾的淡淡香味里悄无声息地让所有惹人讨厌的夏日蚊虫灰飞烟灭
content: Ensure those annoying little blood suckers leave you alone by sparking up this “die mosquitoes” citronella candle. Handmade in New Jersey, this sixteen ounce candle burns for over eighty hours and features an eye-catching “die mosquitoes” decal on the exterior.

Light up the night wherever you go by hitting the town dressed in these eye-catching fiber optic LED shoes. These stunning and super comfy sneakers feature 3 dynamic color modes and can be set to 1 of 7 different hues like red, turquoise, purple, and yellow.

description: 即便在都市空间逼仄的钢筋水泥丛林里，这款工学设计与美学效果完美统一的立式垂直种植花园，采用五层分布花床以及瀑布式级联灌溉系统，让你的生活永远不乏亮眼的颜色和蓬勃的生机
content: Bring color and life into your home or yard – even if you’re tight on space – by using this freestanding vertical planter garden. This weather-resistant garden comes with five sturdy vertical garden beds and features a cascading water drainage system.

description: 毋需钻孔不用布线，这款10分钟内即可装在尾部车牌下方的全天候ZUS智能后视相机自带夜视功能，可让你通过手机随时实时查看其170度视角以内的所有活动，每次充电后可用3个月之久
content: Use your smartphone to see what’s behind your car by mounting the ZUS smart rear view camera to your ride. This weatherproof camera installs without needing any drilling or wiring and gives you a 170 degree wide angle view that lets you see everything – day or night.

titleCN: 自动扁面包/摊饼制作器
description: 无论你喜欢中式煎饼果子还是印度飞饼或者法式可丽饼，使用这款自动扁面包/摊饼制作器，你只需选择厚度和直径之后，然后就可以考虑是配甜面酱还是小凤尾鱼热辣酱或者黄油巧克力酱了
content: Enjoy delicious rotis and wraps at the touch of a button by bringing the Rotimatic flatbread maker into your kitchen. This handy appliance allows you to choose the thickness and roast level of each 7 inch diameter flat bread you make.

titleCN: 迄今为止最棒的猫砂盆
titleEN: The Best Cat Litter Box Ever Made
description: 这款设计巧妙地猫砂盆采用三个完全一样的托盘叠加在彼此上方，创造出的永存筛选循环让清理变成举手之劳，让你彻底丢掉铲屎官的头衔，单纯享受和喵星人相处时的种种乐趣
content: Quit scooping out nasty lumps of cat poop once and for all by using the Luuup litter box. The brilliant design utilizes three identical trays that you stack on top of one another to create a perpetual sifting loop that makes clean up a breeze.

titleCN: 自动狗玩具网球发射器
titleEN: Automatic Tennis Ball Launching Dog Toy
description: 对于黄金猎犬或拉布拉多等大型犬来说，每天一定量的奔跑运动是保持其身心健康的必要前提，这款可设置10、20、30英尺三种投掷距离的自动狗玩具网球发射器，让你不费吹灰之力陪伴爱犬玩耍
content: Tire out your energetic little pup without lifting a finger using this automatic tennis ball launching dog toy. It can be set to a throwing distance of either 10, 20, or 30 feet, making it a great training tool and recreational toy for dogs of all ages.

titleEN: Glow In The Dark Toilet Seat
description: 在没有装备红外夜视瞄准镜的夜里无法准确瞄准马桶是让每个男生都头疼过的问题，这款比一堆荧光棒都要亮的夜光马桶垫，让你不管睡眼惺忪还是醉眼惺忪，都能在足够的能见度下完成精准制导
content: Wave goodbye to nighttime aiming problems thanks to the glow in the dark toilet seat. It glows with the light of a thousand glow sticks so even if you’re too drunk or tired to find the light switch cloaked under the dead of night, you’ll still be able to take care of business.

description: 啤酒乒乓毋庸置疑是每个派对最受欢迎的喝酒游戏，这款用轻便耐用的防撕裂泡沫制成的漂浮啤酒乒乓桌，能装载着16盎司标准的塑料啤酒杯漂浮在水面上，让你的泳池派对成为口口相传的都市传奇
content: Ensure your guests remain good and drunk during your next pool party by hosting a beer pong tournament on this floating table. Made from a lightweight and durable tear resistant foam, it’s designed to fit standard 16 oz party cups and rolls up for easy transport.

description: 每个蹒跚学步的孩子都让父母们既欢喜又揪心，这款按经典蝙蝠侠飞车打造的婴儿学步车，不但通过舒适的防护设计充分保护你的小不点儿，而且还能在移动时发出炫酷的灯光音效，让学步更加有趣
content: Ensure your pint-sized Caped Crusader moves around the house in style by placing him inside this baby Batman walker. Modeled after the iconic Batmobile, it features an easy-swivel steering wheel and gear shifter in addition to flashing lights and cool sound effects.

description: 虽然可能还需要一定的时间才能被列为正式奥运比赛项目，但职业拇指摔跤的观赏性和商业价值毋庸置疑，这款完全按照拉斯维加斯商业比赛规格设计的职业拇指摔跤台，让你的每一次出场都备受瞩目
content: Get serious about your thumb wrestling career by stepping up to the big leagues with this pro thumb wrestling arena. This fun-sized ring will make your next thumb battle look like a high-stakes pro-wrestling match – just like on TV!

description: 虽然谷歌的翻译服务已经日臻完美，但这款设计独特的智能国际语言翻译器还是让我想起了儿时从哆啦A梦剧集中看到的翻译年糕，语言不再是沟通的壁垒，世界真的在科技的驱动下变成一个小小村落
content: Break down language barriers when travelling abroad using this smart international language translator. This handy two-way device will recognize what you say and instantly speak out loud the translation so that you can effectively communicate with the locals.

Chug down an entire bottle faster than you ever thought possible using the Head Rush beer bottle bong! Simply attach this must-have party accessory to the end of your beer bottle, raise it up, and let the delicious nectar rush into your mouth!

description: 这款用硬化的热塑型高分子材料制成的便携式专业鱼竿架，能在不缠绕鱼线不损坏钓竿和轴的情况下携带5个钓具，让你单手就能将所有的昂贵海钓装备提到游艇上，心情愉悦地开始垂钓之旅
content: Conveniently transport all your fishing gear using only one hand with the Rod-Runner pro fishing rod rack. This hardened ABS plastic rack can easily carry up to 5 rods without tangling your lines, breaking guides, or damaging your equipment or reels in any way.

description: 这款设计炫酷配置了第六代英特尔Core i7处理器和NVIDIA GTX 1060显卡的轻量级虚拟现实背包PC机，让你在轻松携带的同时真正尝试原汁原味不插电的虚拟现实体验
content: This virtual reality backpack PC lets you break free from cords so that you can experience VR the way it was truly meant to be. It boasts specs like a 6th-gen Core i7 Intel processor and a NVIDIA GTX 1060 in a light-weight package that you can comfortably wear.

description: 如何把处理废弃高尔夫球变成一项充满乐趣的活动？这款由1018规格钢炮管加橡木底座及黄铜配件组合而成的高尔夫球黑火药加农炮，让你瞬间穿越到19世纪，在克里米亚战争中浴血疆场
content: Tired of hitting golf balls with your club? Send balls soaring through the air in an entirely new way by launching them out of the golf ball cannon! This black powder cannon features a 1018 steel barrel, brass hardware, and sits on an elegant oak carriage.

description: 如何不使用化学药品和喷雾有效除蚊？这款紫外线除蚊灯能通过368nm的紫外线将蚊虫吸引到灯内，然后通过内置的旋涡状风扇将其瞬间置于死地，完全无毒无味无辐射，让你从此不再受蚊虫困扰
content: This mosquito trapping and zapping vortex will ruthlessly decimate all pesky flies without harmful chemicals or sprays! Once the 368nm UV light lures the flies in, a 7-blade inner fan traps them inside where they meet their quick and untimely end.

description: 这款美泰公司出品的风火轮小车50周年纪念版玩具车，能让你将其放在轨道之前牢固地把GoPro Hero 5 Session摄像头固定在其顶端，使你能以第一视角欣赏到风火轮小车的疯狂旅程
content: With this Hot Wheels GoPro mount car you’ll be able to get a first person view of the insane ride your little car takes when you place it on the track. It allows you to safely and securely mount your GoPro Hero 5 Session camera onto the car to capture incredible footage.

description: 这款设计美观的便携式鸡尾酒套装提供了特制的鸡尾酒餐巾和搅拌棒，以及包括古典鸡尾酒、香槟鸡尾酒、琴酒马丁尼三种不同口味的精心配方，让你在长途旅行的飞机上也能品尝到正宗的鸡尾酒
content: This beautifully designed cocktail kit serves 6 premium Old Fashioned cocktails. The kit includes a custom cocktail spoon & muddler, 3 cocktail picks, and cocktail napkins, in addition to all the necessary ingredients you’ll need to make a top-notch Old Fashioned.

titleCN: 智能健康&运动追踪皮带
description: 对健康关注的你想时刻了解身体机能的每一个细节？这款设计新潮的高科技运动追踪皮带可以应用内置的传感器记录下身体的每日起居录，再将其通过蓝牙传送到手机以便日后的数据比较与分析
content: Keeping tabs on your daily physical activity is simpler than ever with WELT – the smart fitness and activity tracking belt. This stylish high-tech accessory comes with built-in sensors that measure your physical activity and then relay the info to your phone via Bluetooth.

Turn the heat up at your next performance by awing spectators with the open palm fireball launcher. With these discreet devices strapped to your wrists, you’ll be able to create magnificent balls of fire that will make you look like a fire-wielding sorcerer.

description: “茶炉依绿笋，棋局就红桃”，这款古色古香的日本抹茶套装内带竹制茶筅茶杓以及木制涂漆茶碗等传统日本茶道所需的工具和器皿，让你在家中也能悠然地享受到原汁原味的日本抹茶
content: Enjoy some soothing matcha tea from the comfort of home using this matcha green tea set. This neat little gift box comes with everything required to whip up an authentic matcha beverage, such as a Japanese made bowl and bamboo utensils.

titleCN: 自动清理的室内狗狗厕所
description: 这款设计独特可自动清理的室内狗狗厕所让爱犬的如厕训练变得简单容易：其自带的传感器能探测到狗狗何时在上面拉粑粑并保持静止状态，等狗狗离开后则会开动马达将排泄物自动包裹起来以便丢弃
content: Keep your home clean and fresh when potty training your puppy by using this self-cleaning automatic indoor dog potty. It comes with built-in sensors that prevent the motor from running when your dog is on the potty and will automatically wrap and clear the pads afterwards.

description: 这款美国著名休闲凉鞋品牌卡洛驰公司推出的女士高跟鞋采用了经典的内含封闭式气泡并能在体温作用下自动变形以提高舒适度的Croslite塑料，让你的优雅美丽不必再以双脚的折磨为代价
content: Thanks to Crocs you’ll now be able to wear heels all day long without torturing your poor feet! Made using their signature Croslite material, these ultra comfortable high heels come with soft straps fitted with an elastic gore for added comfort in addition to durable synthetic soles.

description: 作为一个足迹遍布全球的成功人士，这款全球WiFi热点提供器能让你在无需购买和使用当地SIM卡的情况下，在100多个国家里以低廉的价格享受50Mbps上传和150Mbps下载的4G LTE高速网络
content: Save a bundle on roaming fees while you travel around the world by staying connected using the global WiFi hotspot device. It requires no embedded SIM card, simply switch it on and enjoy surfing the web in over a hundred different countries at discounted rates.

description: 再好的修图软件也没有拍照时一个反光板重要，这款专门为自拍爱好者们设计的手机盒有黑、粉、薄荷三种色系可选，并在边缘内置LED闪光灯，能在你自拍时如反光板一般适时地提供额外的光线
content: Step up your selfie game by ensuring you always have the perfect lighting with this LED iPhone case. Available in a range of shades that include black, pink, and mint, each case comes with a built-in LED strip around the edge to provide extra lighting when you need it.

description: 由高品质的乳油木果油/可可脂/葵花籽油/海盐/各种精油手工制成，这款5盎司纯天然无麸质不含转基因的多彩沐浴炸弹能将你的每次沐浴变成放松而享受的水疗，让你在舒缓压力的同时更加年轻美貌
content: Make your next soak more colorful and relaxing than ever by dropping in one of these giant bath bombs. Each set includes a dozen 5-ounce bombs that are handmade using all natural and organic ingredients that will smooth and moisturize your skin.

Turn your vehicle into a safe and cozy camper with the pickup truck bed tent. This portable shelter fits most pickup truck beds and comes with sealed windows along with features like an extra large entrance to make your stay in the outdoors as pleasant as possible.

description: 1675年英国国王查尔斯二世收到来自南美洲的菠萝作为礼物并专门请画师画下自己与菠萝的合影，这款设计充满复古感的7英尺高菠萝电风扇不但可以驱除夏日的酷暑，也是低调奢华的完美装饰品
content: This pineapple fan is the perfect way to beat the summer heat! This amusing little fan features an eye-catching pineapple design and measures only seven inches – making it ideal for placing in virtually any part of your humble abode.

titleCN: 便携式小巧LED太阳能灯笼
description: 由坚固耐用并可回收的树脂材料制成，这款设计别致的便携式小巧LED太阳能灯笼仅重2.6盎司，扁平折叠后可轻松携带，纯太阳能充电后可续航12小时，是进行露营等户外运动时不可或缺的随身物品
content: This portable compact LED solar lantern is a must-have for anyone who loves spending time outdoors. Weighing a mere 2.6 ounces, this ultra lightweight lantern folds flat for easy storage, has a 12 hour battery life, and is bright enough to light up a 100 square foot room.

description: 这款设计独特的脖颈吊床采用了两根医疗级别的可调节吊带，让你可以随时随地将其悬挂在门把手上制成一个迷你吊床，然后放松舒展脖颈肩膀及背部，让你快速修整后重新焕发青春活力
content: Relax, stretch, and rejuvenate your neck and shoulders anytime, anywhere with the neck hammock. It sports two medical grade adjustable straps that you can conveniently hang on any door so that you can get quick neck and back relief!

description: 只需要两节AA电池，你就可以哼着“See me fly/I am proud to fly up high”，躺在床上看这款身长6英尺翼展15英尺的小飞猪扇着翅膀在空中作圆形盘旋，最佳治愈玩具，没有之一
content: The day has finally come when pigs fly – kind of! Although this portly little battery operated piggy can’t actually fly on his own, it comes with a ceiling mount so that you hang him and watch him hover in circles as he flaps his little wings up and down.

description: 这款音乐特斯拉线圈套装提供了所需的一切组件，能让年轻的科学爱好者们打造出可以伴随着4英尺长电火花播放MIDI音乐的炫酷特斯拉线圈，还可通过笔记本与USB接口对其进行精准控制
content: Get the young whipper snappers interested in science by having them build their very own mini musical Tesla coil. The kit comes with everything needed to easily build a compact singing Tesla coil that emits a charming melody as the sparks fly.

description: 对街角熟食店美味的烤牛肉三明治垂涎不已念念不忘？这款别出心裁的烤牛肉三明治浴盐能让你在舒缓疲劳的同时享受顶级的味觉体验，让每一次沐浴都变得回味无穷秀色可餐
content: Get whisked off to your favorite corner deli the next time you decide to soak in a relaxing bath by dropping in these roast beef sandwich bath salts. These deliciously weird premium quality bath salts make the perfect gift for any meat lover that enjoys pampering themselves.

description: 这款一体式咖啡冲泡烟斗套装包括丁烷四角喷枪、集成吸管、温度计、铜制冷却架、不锈钢过滤器、以及试管状研磨罐，将咖啡和水加入冲泡器加热到185度，冷却后即可享受纯正的咖啡
content: The Bripe coffee brewing pipe is the must-have accessory for any caffeine addict who loves the great outdoors. This ultra portable copper pipe allows you to easily whip up a savory cup of Joe, espresso, or tea in less than three minutes.

description: 教会你的狗狗在需要拉粑粑的时候跳起来触碰这款响声嘹亮并通过可调节悬挂带安置在门廊上房的遛狗提醒门铃，让狗狗再也不需要内急的时候在门口不安地踱步哀怨地低嚎以及怨恨地刮擦地板了
content: Train your pup to ring a bell when he wants to go outside by placing this housebreaking dog doorbell on your doorway. This adjustable belt comes fitted with small yet loud bells that will jingle to notify you when your doggy has to go outside.

description: 这款防雨防风防雪防雹并可通过钥匙远程控制展开和收起的自动汽车顶棚伞，可以在烈日炎炎的夏天保护你的爱车不受暴晒，也能在白雪皑皑的冬日确保你的座驾免遭冰雪，是爱车人士不可或缺之物
content: Keep your vehicle from overheating while it’s parked outside by equipping your ride with the automatic car umbrella. This functional accessory helps keep your car protected from the elements and can be easily deployed using the small keychain remote.

description: 作为一位加冕在即的家政女王，这款设计巧妙的蜂窝状整理架能放入任何标准抽屉当中并凭空创造出32个六角形的独立功能空间，让你在游刃有余归置内衣帽袜的同时还可点缀手工艺品增添生活情趣
content: Maintain order inside your drawers on a daily basis by placing one of these honeycomb drawer organizers inside each one. It can easily be placed inside any standard drawer and provides 32 hexagonal slots ideal for ensuring your clothes remain separated.

description: 如果你曾被荷兰艺术家泰奥.杨森用木头和塑料制造的纯风力驱动巨型海滩仿生兽所震撼，那么这款迷你海滩仿生兽套装让你有机会在书房创造出属于你的8英尺长5英尺宽7英尺高的小型海滩仿生兽
content: If you’re struggling with what to get the tinkerer in your life for their upcoming birthday, feast your eyes on this unique Mini Strandbeest model kit. They’ll be able to construct a cool little moving kinetic sculpture that is powered solely by the wind.

description: 如何给你的卧室增添些许神秘色彩？这款设计巧妙的迷之灯套装内含30多个拼图组件，可以组装出15种不同图案款式的精美灯罩，让你在提升家居品味的同时创造出神秘的美感和有趣的谈资
content: Make any room in your home come to life by creating some eye-catching ambient lighting by putting together your very own puzzle light. Each kit comes with 30 individual pieces that you can assemble to 1 of 15 possible lamps designs.

description: 从航空历史和军事规范中汲取灵感的柏莱士表每一块都与众不同，这款赌场主题的柏莱士腕表以俄罗斯黄金轮盘赌轮为表盘，精密复杂的机械装置和巧夺天工的工业设计帮助佩戴者走向新的成功
content: Commemorate your love of gambling like a true high roller by dropping some serious change on this Bell and Ross casino watch. The face of this unique and extravagant timepiece comes styled like a pint-sized golden roulette wheel.

titleCN: 儿童版侏罗纪公园越野吉普
description: 在孩子的眼中每一天都是新冒险的开始，这款最高时速5迈配备2座椅储物空间充裕可载130磅并自带横悬探照灯的儿童版侏罗纪公园越野吉普车，让小冒险家们在车载扬声器发出的霸王龙怒吼中一往无前
content: Ensure your kid’s day is filled with fun and adventure by placing him behind the wheel of this Jurassic Park ride-on Jeep. It comfortably seats 2, tops out at 5 miles per hour, and comes fitted with onboard speakers that emit cool dinosaur roaring sound effects.

description: 在亚马逊的热带雨林中被蚊虫叮咬辗转反侧？这款简单易用并带有伸缩挂钩的二合一可充电灭蚊露营灯不但能够提供充足光源，其自带的紫外线防水灭蚊灯还能创造出一块16英寸见方的无蚊净土
content: Keeping your campsite bug-free is as easy as turning on this mosquito zapping camping lantern. This 2-in-1 rechargeable lantern comes fitted with a small waterproof ultraviolet light bug zapper that will provide a 16 x 16 foot mosquito-free zone.

description: 如果你对北欧神话中骁勇善战的维京海盗情有独钟，那这款用弹性钢纯手工打造制作精美的维京战斧式刮胡刀一定让你爱不释手，由山毛榉木和黄铜制成的复古外盒还可镌刻自定义的花纹或文字
content: Keep your facial game on check like a true Nordic warrior by mansccaping your mug using this Viking axe straight shaving razor. This awesome straight razor is forged out of tempered steel and is complemented by a handmade beech wood and copper or brass handle.

description: 生活中总是有一些让你忍不住骂人的时刻，即便身处异国用另一种语言，也决不能在互飙脏话的比赛中甘拜下风，这本充满邪恶智慧的混搭脏话生成器绝对让你的亵渎口吐莲花出神入化神鬼莫测
content: Ensure you always have the perfect insult for any occasion by keeping this mix and match profanity generator handy. When standard insults just won’t do, this book will provide you with endless alternatives like “fart gobbler”, “meat wipe”, and “crap wad”.

The Scale of Things is the incredibly intriguing read that will change how you view the world around you. It brings together facts and figures in a scientific yet visually captivating way – embracing popular topics covering everything from science to geography to politics.

description: 这款设计独特的超级充气水上乐园带有两个可持续发射的水柱的高压加农炮以及可让多个孩子同时玩耍的硕大水上滑梯，能轻易将你的后院变成全街区孩子们口中那流淌着奶与蜜的应许之地
content: Turn your backyard into the coolest place in the entire neighborhood by blowing up the Kahuna Mega Blast inflatable water park. It boasts two continuous water blasting cannons and an ample sliding surface that is big enough for several kids to slide down at once.

description: 生活中的小情趣通常藏在日常某个不经意的细节里，这款充满创意和灵感的绕月飞行火箭墙钟让你可以在每一次看表时都假想自己是休斯顿控制中心，欣赏红色小火箭飞过布满陨石坑的月球
content: Give the mundane task of telling time a fun out-of-this-world twist by hanging up this cool rocket moon wall clock. Thanks to the clock’s clever design, you’re treated to an ongoing flight flow as the small rocket orbits around the crater-filled moon ever sixty seconds.

titleEN: The People Of Walmart Coloring Book
description: 沃尔玛是一个神奇的地方，在这里你可以遇到形形色色的各类怪异消费者，这本成人涂色书让你有机会运用你的艺术天分为纸上这些千奇百怪的形象画龙点睛，在治愈内心的同时得到欢乐
content: Bring the gloriously odd breed of shoppers known as The People of Walmart to life with your artistic skills. This adult themed coloring book contains page after page of the wonderfully weird shoppers you’re likely to encounter at the land of Walmart.

description: 这款用航天级铝做刀身锋利的440c不锈钢做刀刃并镌刻有武士道花纹的折叠式口袋武士刀，让你可以用佐佐木小次郎匪夷所思的拔刀术或宫本武藏目不暇接的双刀流来裁信封切苹果割胶带
content: Slice through envelopes, tape, and other everyday objects with warrior like ferocity with one of these folding pocket samurai knives. They feature an aircraft grade aluminum body and a razor sharp 440c stainless steel tanto blade complete with a Japanese engraving.

description: 即便藏在装了隔音膜的地下室里，练习架子鼓时产生的噪音依然会让邻居皱眉，这款携带方便可带着耳机练习并能通过电脑视频捕捉发出与真鼓相同音效的空鼓打击乐器让你在练习时再无后顾之忧
content: Perfect your percussion technique without receiving noise complaints from the neighbors by using this air drumming percussion instrument. It’s compatible with both Windows and Apple operating systems and is portable enough to take virtually anywhere.

description: 纸飞机听起来已经是属于上个世纪的古董名词了，这款由碳纤维和发泡聚丙烯泡沫塑料打造、每次充电后可飞行12分钟的飞行器不但设计别致而且可由智能手机控制，让你领略21世纪飞行玩具的乐趣
content: Paper airplanes are so twentieth century. Step into the future of flight with this smartphone app controlled airplane. This compact carbon fiber and EPP foam airplane can be easily controlled using your smartphone and features a flight time of 12 minutes per charge.

description: 绝妙的产品设计能给任何波澜不惊的屋子瞬间带来闪电般的时尚感，这款有8种不同颜色可选、复古和新潮风格混搭、让老派爱迪生灯泡重新成为舞台主角的透明桌面台灯，毋庸置疑当属此列
content: Add a dash of style to any room in your home by turning on this quaint little transparent table lamp. Available in one of eight cool colors, each lamp features a completely see-through design that makes the old fashioned Edison bulb become the star of the show.

Feel like a mighty Nordic warrior by grabbing a hold of this intimidating hand forged steel viking axe. These axes are expertly made in the Ukraine without the use of any CNC machines or other modern day tools – guaranteeing that each piece is truly one-of-a-kind.

Fitting rooms just became obsolete. Prime Wardrobe is the new service from Amazon that let’s you try on clothes before you buy them. After ordering, you’ll have a full week to try them out and send back whatever you didn’t like or didn’t fit right using a prepaid shipping label.

titleCN: 可复用便携式旅行便池
description: 俗话说人有三急，当你被不幸困在纹丝不动的堵车中时，佳得乐和营养快线都只是相声里的包袱而已，你真正需要的是这款淡蓝色密封性极佳收缩时便于携带展开时可容纳750毫升尿液的旅行便池
content: When you gotta go, you gotta go. With this reusable portable travel urinal you’ll be able to do just that – even if there’s no bathroom in sight. It features a shrinkable design for easy transport and can extend to hold up to 750 mL of liquid.

description: 人生最惬意的事无非夜幕低垂的夏日傍晚和几个知心好友弹着吉他喝着啤酒围坐在营火旁唱歌叙旧，即便就在后院的草坪上，这款燃烧丙烷设计安全的罐装营火也可以创造出完美效果，让你不醉不归
content: Fire up the good times as you create a cozy environment with the campfire in a can. Whether the night calls for a propane lit fire or a traditional wood burning flame, this sturdy and portable can is ready to meet the challenge!

description: 当你在不平整的地面如斜坡或楼梯上摆放扶梯时，这款可调整角度并配有额外抓地力和特殊防滑表面的扶梯校平工具，能让你最大程度地减少受伤可能，在你悉心保护家人的时候悉心地保护你
content: Minimize the risk of serious injury when you’re hanging something over your home’s staircase with the PiVit ladder leveling tool. It’s fully adjustable and sports extra grippy feet ideal for smooth surfaces in addition to a large non-slip surface so your ladder remains in place.

description: 这款设计新颖的防水硅胶盥洗用品整理器能轻易吸附在浴室光滑的墙壁上，创造出的便利储蓄空间能让你轻松归置牙膏牙刷剃刀漱口水等小件物品，独特的排水设计能保持物品干燥不受霉菌侵扰
content: Help maintain cleanliness and order in your bathroom using the Mighty toiletries organizer. The innovative design allows you to conveniently stick it onto any smooth vertical surface to provide a handy storage spot for everything from your toothbrush to your razor.

description: 淡泊以明志，宁静以致远，当你在试图探索内心平和或沉思生命意义的时候，这株剪裁优雅的巴西雨豆树乔木盆栽，不但装饰了你的房间，也给你内心的禅意花园增添了些许诗意的色彩
content: Achieve inner peace and/or ponder the meaning of life while trimming the tiny branches of the Brazilian rain bonsai tree. This small bonsai tree looks great in any indoor or office environment and functions as a fabulous accent for your home zen garden.

description: 这款锁身由防篡改锌制成锁环由硬化钢打造设计独特色彩大胆的智能条形码邮件挂锁，只有当扫描到正确的条形码时方可开启并发送实时提醒至手机APP，是智能家居革命中不可或缺的创意产品
content: BoxLock is the smart padlock that only unlocks when the correct barcode is scanned – so your packages can safely get dropped off, even if you’re not home. It features a simple push button scan, up to a 60 day battery life, and sports a sturdy weatherproof case.

description: 美味的蒜香薯条和炸鸡柳固然好吃，但番茄酱和田园酱则容易把车里搞得一团糟，这款车载调料支架能被牢牢地固定在方向盘旁的空调通风口上，确保再颠簸的路况你也可以从容不迫地大快朵颐
content: Slather your delicious fast food in savory sauce without making a mess by outfitting your ride with this in-car condiment holder. This clip is specially designed to fit into your car’s air vent so that you can conveniently dip your food while you’re on-the-go.

titleEN: Sh*t I Can’t Remember Password Journal
content: With the ever increasing amount of accounts you create online, remembering all your passwords can get a bit tricky. Luckily, with the ‘sh*t I can’t remember” password journal by your side you’ll be able to conveniently write down all your login info so it’s always at hand.

Ensure you remain visible to oncoming traffic when you’re exercising at night by heading out in this LED reflective cycling and running vest. This fashionable vest comes fitted with thin LED strips over the front and lower back so that you stand out in dark environments.

description: 炎炎夏日里没有任何东西能比清爽的冷饮更让人心动了，这款专为降温解暑而设计的雪泥冰沙奶昔制作器，能在几分钟里便捷地制作出爽口的雪泥美味的冰沙诱人的奶昔甚至冰冻的鸡尾酒
content: Enjoy delicious and refreshing smoothies and milkshakes on demand by whipping them up using this slushie shake maker. It allows you to conveniently prepare smoothies, shakes, slushies, and even frozen cocktails in mere minutes.

description: 每个在草地或泥潭里疯玩儿过的大型犬背后都有一个满脸愁容又无可奈何的主人，这时只需要将注满肥皂的360度狗狗洗浴圈连接水管，即可创造出洗车房般的清洗体验，让狗狗瞬间出淤泥而不染
content: Washing all the dirt and grime off Rover has never been easier than with the 360 degree dog washer. Simply add soap and connect to the hose and a string of water jets will wash every inch of filth off of your pup in less than a minute.

description: 顶级料理基于科学测量，这款由硅胶和不锈钢制成的数字牛排温度计可同时对烤箱或烤架中的4块牛排进行检测并以颜色区分显示温度，还支持从一分熟到十分熟的自定义温度值，让你的厨艺完美逆袭
content: Cook your premium slab of meat to perfection every time with this digital steak thermometer. This grill and oven friendly thermometer can accommodate up to 4 probes and simultaneously display their temperatures so that you can monitor all your steaks at once.

description: 这个起源于中国后传入欧洲进而风靡世界且因为长相滑稽而被誉为“其存在是上帝幽默感明证”的犬种，既被丘吉尔钟爱也在《黑衣人》电影中客串，这本收集了诸多幽默照片及注解的影集绝对让你捧腹不已
content: Enjoy hours of cute and adorably quirky dogs with the pug mugshot book as your coffee table’s centerpiece. It features page after page of mugshots portraying these oddly appealing pups placed in all types of scenarios along with witty captions.

description: 这款设计为可爱热狗造型的宠物床包含了两个较小的柔软蓬松软垫以及一个较大的可拆洗软垫，能让你的爱犬或爱猫在疲惫时惬意地蜷在这个温软的窝里休息和撒娇
content: Keep your little furball in total comfort while they lounge around the house by getting them this comfy hot dog pet bed. This adorable little hot dog shaped bed sports two soft and fluffy bun cushions in addition to a removable and washable cushion.

description: 这款维堤咖啡筛粉器通过12片滤网以可量化的微米单位测量你的研磨刻度，将大小不同的咖啡粉分门别类后把你最想要的保留下来并以最佳的时间冲煮，让你在家里也能品尝到米兰街头咖啡厅的感觉
content: Barista Tested, Barista Approved. The KRUVE Sifter brings competition-level coffee quality to the home brewer. With two tiers and up to twelve interchangeable sieves, it can make any coffee taste better, regardless of the brew method.

description: 这款革命性的可穿戴蓝牙键盘能够让你将周围的任何物体变成个人键盘，只需要轻轻地挥动手指就可以实现打字、移动鼠标、操控触摸屏等复杂动作，让你享受到《天龙八部》里六脉神剑的至爽体验
content: This wearable Bluetooth keyboard is the revolutionary new product designed to turn anything around you into your own personal keyboard. It allows you to easily type, navigate through screens, and even control smart TVs just by tapping your fingers on any surface.
